member.name: M:Narumikazuchi.Networking.Sockets.Client`1.Connect(System.Net.IPAddress)
member.summary:
Tries to establish a connection to a server.
Use the public IP if you are connecting to a server outside you own LAN.
member.param: The IP-Address the client should connect to.
